content.summary: Data Scientist with experience at Rubixe, specializing in streamlining data collection and reporting procedures, improving productivity, and conducting market research. Possesses expertise in various programming languages, frameworks, tools, and platforms. Demonstrates strong soft skills such as rapport building, stakeholder management, people management, and excellent communication.

experience.title: Data Scientist Consultant
responsibilities: Streamlined data collection and reporting procedures, reducing processing time by 20%.
Implemented process improvements and automation solutions, resulting in a 15% increase in productivity.
Collaborated with multiple cross-functional teams to gather requirements, define project scopes, and ensure alignment with business objectives.
Produced 15+ comprehensive reports and presentations summarizing findings and recommendations.
Conducted in-depth market research and analysis, resulting in the identification of key trends and insights.

projects.title: Instagram Video to Text Convertor
projects.objective: Convert Instagram influencer videos into text for easier analysis.
contributions: Downloaded the video using Instaloader on Jupyter Notebook
Converted the video to audio using moviepy
Used Openai Whisper to convert audio to text and saved it into a CSV file

projects.title: Texas Salary Prediction
projects.objective: Predict Texas salaries based on various factors.
contributions: Developed and fine-tuned a regression-based machine learning model
Minimized false positives through rigorous feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning
Implemented under-sampling and ensemble techniques to address class imbalance

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.objective: Predict heart disease based on various factors.
contributions: Orchestrated the development of a Logit model to predict heart disease
Spearheaded the implementation of HIPAA-compliant data encryption protocols
Enhanced healthcare outcomes by accurately predicting heart disease

projects.title: License Plate Recognition
projects.objective: Automate vehicle identification using License Plate Recognition (LPR) technology.
contributions: Leveraged optical character recognition (OCR) to automate license plate reading
Ensured operational accuracy, addressed environmental challenges, and ensured compliance with privacy and legal standards

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: 7.46 GPA in Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Science and Engineering)
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed various personal projects showcasing learning and initiative
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Collaborated with multiple cross-functional teams, fostering effective teamwork and project success
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Produced 15+ comprehensive reports and presentations summarizing findings and recommendations
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Impressed accuracy rates in predictive models and decreased data breach incidents by 40%
